name: The Curse of Cupid (Major Jam & 8x8 Jam 2)
name_original: The Curse of Cupid (Major Jam & 8x8 Jam 2)
description:
The Curse of Cupid was made in 7 days for the Major Jam and 8x8 Jam 2.

This upload includes the source Construct 3 project file and the tile map graphics used as part of the requirements of the jams.

Gameplay

The goal of the game is to collect hearts to upgrade your abilities and buy arrows in caves and shrines to defeat giant creatures and ultimately curse the Emperor of Rome!

There are instructions in game how to play, however the most important is unlimited normal golden arrows can only kill humans, red arrows are limited (or purchased) and are needed to kill creatures.

Controls

WASD, Arrow keys, or gamepad D-pad to move left and right.

Z key, N key, or gamepad Button A to confirm and fly.

X key, M key, or gamepad Button B to fire an arrow.
